metadata.Title: CVE-2015-1200 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Race condition in pxz 4.999.99 Beta 3 uses weak file permissions for theoutput file when compressing a file before changing the permission to matchthe original file, which allows local users to bypass the intended accessrestrictions.

criterions.comment: pxz: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
